name: 林啟瑞
objective:
讀書報告、專題討論、機電科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
　　Abstract：reading report、class discussion、relative techniques of mechanical and electrical product introduction and discussion、Seminar thoughts，it can take the courses from one to another.
